players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Alice is the mafioso. Diana was killed last night, and my investigation revealed Alice as the mafia."
Charlie: "Bob, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Alice instead of Diana? That seems odd for night 1."
You: "Bob is lying. If he were the detective, why investigate me night 1 instead of Diana? He's trying to frame me to hide his own guilt."
You: "Bob's accusation makes no sense. If he were the detective, why investigate me instead of Diana on night 1? He's clearly lying to frame me."

Bob: "Alice is lying. My investigation confirmed she is the mafioso. Charlie, the order of investigation is irrelevant; the result is what matters. Alice is trying to deflect by questioning my actions."
Charlie: "Bob, if you investigated Diana and she was town, why not say that? Your story doesn't add up."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
